import React, { useCallback } from 'react'; import { User, X, Edit2, Trash2, Phone, Mail, DollarSign, Tag, ClipboardList, Briefcase, Calendar, MapPin } from 'lucide-react'; const DetailItem = React.memo(({ icon, label, value }) => (
{icon}{label}
{value || Not provided}

} label="Quality" value={{lead.quality}} /> } label="Disposition" value={lead.disposition} /> } label="Lead Source" value={lead.leadSource} />
